title: Frohito
recipe: Add .25 ounce of the Mint Syrup to each of two chilled cocktail glasses and set aside.
Add the rum, lime juice and ice to a blender and blend until a uniform frappe consistency.
Divide the mixture evenly between the two glasses and top each with an additional .25 ounce of the Mint Syrup.
Garnish each glass with a mint sprig.
